item.title: Balancing College, Sports, and Side Hustles
item.description: Balancing college academics, athletics, and side hustles can feel like trying to manage three full-time jobs at once. As a student-athlete, my schedule is already packed with classes, practices, lifts, travel, and games. On top of that, I run multiple side businesses and work on developing my skills in finance, cybersecurity, and web development. Even though it’s a lot, I’ve learned that the right mindset and systems make it possible.
